appeals: United Kingdom Supreme Court, (only on points of "devolution issues" under the Scotland Act 1998, including some now called "compatibility issues" under the Scotland Act 2012, on points of EU law, or on points of the Human Rights Act 1998 and on the European Convention of Human Rights, or some or all of the above),  https://www.supremecourt.uk/docs/jurisdiction-of-the-supreme-court-in-scottish-appeals.pdf  https://twitter.com/joannaccherry/status/901852521337163777
